law.catch_line: When removed case stands for trial.
law.text: Upon receipt of the paper the receiving clerk shall note the action of record, and the action shall proceed as if the last pleading, motion or order was made on the date of such notation.
law.history: Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 53, effective July 1, 1953. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1100.
